section.heading: Functions and operations of the Board.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 21-254: § 501 of D.C. Law 21-254 provided that the creation of this section by § 203 of D.C. Law 21-254 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore the change made to this section by that amendment has been delayed.
